seattle.name: Rob Roy
seattle.description: A must try cocktail bar in Seattle. Unique drinks that include a gunpowder cocktail with real gunpowder!

seattle.name: Due Cucina
seattle.description: Small authentic Italian restaurant is located in Capital Hill area. This pasta joint is not only affordable (each plate less than $14 base) but the fresh pasta is handmade daily. Other popular handmade pasta establishments in Seattle are not as affordable by far. This is a must try for any traveler on a budget or pasta lover in general.
